page.title: Utilities
page.headline: Utilities
page.description: Client-side tools that run entirely in your browser for privacy, speed, and convenience. No data ever leaves your device.
page.blurb: A collection of client-side tools that run entirely in your browser. No data is uploaded to any server - everything is processed locally on your device for privacy and speed.

meta.title: ethan - utilities
meta.description: Explore private, client-side tools built by Ethan that run fully in your browser - no servers, no tracking, just fast utilities.

utilities.name: Favicon Converter
utilities.shortDescription: Turn any image into ready-to-use favicon files with selectable sizes and formats, all processed locally.
utilities.teaser: Generate favicon ICO or PNG assets from any image without uploads. Choose the sizes you need and download instantly.
utilities.detailIntro: Generate favicon assets entirely in your browser. Drop in an image, choose the sizes you need, and download ICO or PNG files without sending data anywhere.

meta.title: Favicon Converter - ethan.dev
meta.description: Turn any image into downloadable favicon files (ICO or PNG) directly in your browser. Select your sizes, keep everything local.

utilities.name: Video Converter
utilities.shortDescription: Convert videos between popular formats (MP4, WebM, AVI, MOV, MKV, GIF) directly in your browser with optional compression and quality controls.
utilities.teaser: Convert videos between different formats (MP4, WebM, AVI, MOV, and more) directly in your browser. Supports compression and quality adjustments.
utilities.detailIntro: Convert videos between different formats directly in your browser. All processing happens locally on your device - no uploads, completely private and secure.

meta.title: Video Converter - ethan.dev
meta.description: Browser-based video converter powered by FFmpeg.wasm. Convert MP4, WebM, AVI, MOV, MKV, GIF, and more without uploading files anywhere.

utilities.name: Location History Visualizer
utilities.shortDescription: Visualize your Google location history (exported from Google Maps or Google Takeout) on an interactive map with pins, route lines, and date range filtering.
utilities.teaser: Upload your Google location history and see your journey visualized on an interactive map with location pins and route lines. Supports exports from Google Maps app and Google Takeout.
utilities.detailIntro: Visualize your Google location history on an interactive map. Export your Timeline data from the Google Maps app (Settings > Location > Export Timeline data) or use older Google Takeout files. Filter by date range and explore your journey with location pins and route lines. All processing happens locally in your browser.

meta.title: Location History Visualizer - ethan.dev
meta.description: Visualize your Google Takeout location history on an interactive map. See your journey with pins and route lines, filter by date range. Completely private and client-side.
